_description: The Weapons table shows the most common weapons used in the fantasy gaming worlds, their price and weight, the damage they deal when they hit, and any special properties they possess. Every weapon is classified as either melee or ranged. A melee weapon is used to attack a target within 5 feet of you, whereas a ranged weapon is used to attack a target at a distance.

martial._description: A martial weapon is any weapon or offhand that aids a martialist profession.

melee.halberd: 20 gp 1 d10 slashing 6 lb.Heavy, reach, two - handed
melee.maul: 10 gp 2 d6 bludgeoning 10 lb.Heavy, two - handed
melee.pike: 5 gp 1 d10 piercing 18 lb.Heavy, reach, two - handed
melee.trident: 5 gp 1 d6 piercing 4 lb.Thrown(range 20 / 60), versatile(1 d8)

ranged.hand crossbow: 75 gp 1 d6 piercing 3 lb.Ammunition(range 30 / 120), light, loading
ranged.heavy crossbow: 50 gp 1 d10 piercing 18 lb.Ammunition(range 100 / 400), heavy, loading, two - handed
ranged.longbow: 50 gp 1 d8 piercing 2 lb.Ammunition(range 150 / 600), heavy, two - handed

simple._description: Simple weapons require the least training to use correctly and effectively.

melee._description: A melee weapon is a weapon that can attack adjacent targets.

club.description: A club is among the simplest of all weapons: a short staff or stick, usually made of wood, wielded as a weapon since prehistoric times.
club.name: Club

dagger.description: A dagger is a knife with a very sharp point and one or two sharp edges, typically designed or capable of being used as a thrusting or stabbing weapon.
dagger.name: Dagger

greatclub.description: A greatclub is a simple two-handed melee weapon in the club weapon group.
greatclub.name: Greatclub

handaxe.description: A handaxe is an one-handed weapon. It is also a heavy thrown weapon, so a character can throw it to make ranged attacks, using STR instead of DEX for ranged basic attacks.
handaxe.name: Handaxe

javelin.description: A javelin is a simple one-handed melee weapon in the spear weapon group. A javelin is a heavy thrown weapon, so a character can throw it to make ranged attacks, using STR instead of DEX for ranged basic attacks.
javelin.name: Javelin

light hammer.description: The light hammer is a small sledge hammer, usually with a haft made of wood about one and a half feet long.
light hammer.name: Light hammer

mace.description: A mace is a simple bludgeoning weapon resembling a metal club. The striking head of the mace is symmetrically arrayed with flanges, knobs, or high ridges designed to inflict damage on an armored opponent.
mace.name: Mace

quarterstaff.description: A quarterstaff is a two-handed weapon. A quarterstaff is usually made of wood and sanded cylindrical, with blunt ends. They may be plain wood to intricately carved works of art.
quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff

sickle.description: The sickle is a farm implement slightly modified and strengthened to make a melee weapon. It has a handle to which is attached a blade that is curved in more or less a semicircle, coming to a sharp point. The cutting edge is on the inside of the curve.
sickle.name: Sickle

spear.description: A spear can be made of any rigid material but is typically a straight shaft made of wood. The piercing tip of the spear can be formed by just sharpening the shaft to a point or attaching a variety of spearheads made from metal.
spear.name: Spear

ranged._description: A ranged weapon is any weapon that can engage targets beyond hand-to-hand distance

dart.description: Darts are missile weapons, designed to fly such that a sharp, often weighted point will strike first.
dart.name: Dart

light crossbow.description: Standard crossbow lighter and more portable. Must be readied before firing.
light crossbow.name: Light Crossbow

shortbow.description: The short bow is a two-handed weapon. Compared to a longbow, it has less power and range but a higher rate of fire.
shortbow.name: Shortbow

sling.description: A sling is a projectile weapon typically used to throw a blunt projectile such as a stone, clay, or lead 'sling-bullet'. Someone who specialises in using slings is called a slinger.
sling.name: Sling
